subject: Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
Horses
Eight Belles (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Over the past five years, 3,035 thoroughbreds, standardbreds and quarter horses have died at racing facilities, but not all of them on the racetrack or in racing-related accidents.
snippet: Over the past five years, 3,035 thoroughbreds, standardbreds and quarter horses have died at racing facilities, but not all of them on the racetrack or in racing-related accidents.
